content: in this legal case the court in caltanissetta made several decisions regarding the division of an inheritance they declared the succession open and dissolved the community of inheritance between the parties involved the court determined the ownership of certain properties and ordered the remaining shares to be allocated through drawing lots they appointed a technical expert to assess the assets and prepare a divisional project which was agreed upon by the parties and deemed valid the court assigned a specific share to one party and ordered the remaining shares to be determined through drawing lots the final judgment will be used to conduct the drawing lots and allocate the assets the court also stated that the costs of the litigation and the technical expertise would be divided among the parties these decisions were made on june 26 2017 in caltanissetta
